channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rep. Nancy Mace says she was assaulted by pro-transgender man
item.description: Rep. Nancy Mace said Tuesday that she was assaulted over her stand on transgender issues and that the attacker has been arrested.

item.title: The Affirmative Action Fight Comes to High Schools
item.description: The ‘Handicapper General’ interpretation of the equal protection clause must not stand.

item.title: The Federalist Notable Books Of 2024
item.description: Looking for last minute book recommendations either as gifts or to read during some holiday downtime? The Federalist has recommendations.

item.title: Florida lawmaker introduces bill to require DACA students to pay out-of-state tuition
item.description: Florida state Sen. Randy Fine proposed a bill to require students in the Sunshine State with DACA status to pay out-of-state tuition for college.

item.title: Alvin Bragg Opposes Trump’s Dismissal Motion
item.description: My hope is that common sense prevails.

item.title: Kimberly Guilfoyle gets Greece post amid reports of split with fiance Donald Trump Jr.
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump said he will appoint Kimberly Guilfoyle to be ambassador to Greece amid tabloid reports that Donald Trump Jr. wants to be...

item.title: Exclusive: Chinese National Who Allegedly Voted In Michigan Is Still On The Voter Rolls
item.description: A Chinese student at the University of Michigan is facing charges for noncitizen voting. The Federalist has learned he is still on the voter rolls.

item.title: Documentary Uncovers British Deep State That Deposed Prime Minister In 44 Days
item.description: Truss believes a political alignment is coming in Britain, and it is likely to be similar to Trump-style populism.

item.title: Trump names Ronald Johnson to serve as ambassador to Mexico
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump on Tuesday nominated Ronald Johnson, who served as his ambassador to El Salvador during his first administration, to be t...

item.title: Republicans Can Help Workers without Helping Unions
item.description: What America’s working class actually wants is for political leaders to pursue a pro-worker rather than a pro-union agenda.

item.title: Trump Should Swear Off Lawfare
item.description: He is right when he touts success as the best form of vengeance.

item.title: Outgoing Rep. Jamaal Bowman issues 'Dear White People' thread following Daniel Penny acquittal
item.description: Rep. Jamaal Bowman issues "Dear White People" message following Daniel Penny acquittal. Bowman, who lost a Democratic primary earlier this year, will ...

item.title: Police identify suspect in assault on Rep. Nancy Mace
item.description: Authorities identified the man accused of assaulting Rep. Nancy Mace in what the South Carolina Republican called an attack over her stance on transge...

item.title: CNN’s Reckless Smear Tactics Could Cost Them Big After Latest Court Ruling
item.description: Judge Henry found that CNN had "no evidence that Young did anything criminal or illegal" and yet went ahead with the "black market" accusation anyway.

item.title: Trump to promote FTC Commissioner Andrew Ferguson to head of agency

item.title: Protesters attempt to stop removal of hundreds of migrants from public-funded housing
item.description: Activists and elected officials gathered outside Gov. Kathy Hochul’s office on Monday to protest the closure of two hotels housing hundreds of migrant...

item.title: Top DOGE senator demands answers on plan to exhaust CHIPs Act funds before Trump arrives

item.title: Biden could pardon these Trump adversaries amid Dem fears that 'revengeful first year' is looming
item.description: President Biden is reportedly mulling issuing blanket pardons to President-elect Donald Trump's political antagonists ahead of his exit from the Oval ...

item.title: America Is Lessened With Adam Schiff In The Senate
item.description: If Schiff weren’t so hellbent on bringing down Trump, he might have realized that there ought to be an investigation of the Biden family.

item.title: ‘I Feel Betrayed’: Who Will Speak Up for the Israeli Women Held Hostage by Hamas?
item.description: In its campaign against gender-based violence, UN Women has all but ignored Hamas’s atrocities. Hostage families are speaking out.
